aima.core.agent

Interface EnvironmentView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleEnvironmentView, VacuumEnvironmentViewActionTracker

    public interface EnvironmentView
    Allows external applications/logic to view the interaction of Agent(s) with an Environment.
    Author:
    Ravi Mohan, Ciaran O'Reilly, Mike Stampone, Ruediger Lunde

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void agentActed(Agent agent, Action action, Environment source)
      Indicates the Environment has changed as a result of an Agent's action.
      void agentAdded(Agent agent, Environment source)
      Indicates an Agent has been added to the environment and what it perceives initially.
      void notify(java.lang.String msg)
      A simple notification message from an object in the Environment.

    • Method Detail

      • notify

        void notify(java.lang.String msg)
        A simple notification message from an object in the Environment.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message received.

      • agentAdded

        void agentAdded(Agent agent,
                Environment source)
        Indicates an Agent has been added to the environment and what it perceives initially.
        Parameters:
        agent - the Agent just added to the Environment.
        source - the Environment to which the agent was added.

      • agentActed

        void agentActed(Agent agent,
                Action action,
                Environment source)
        Indicates the Environment has changed as a result of an Agent's action.
        Parameters:
        agent - the Agent that performed the Action.
        action - the Action the Agent performed.
        source - the Environment in which the agent has acted.
